text:
[Verse]
Sunshine in the morning
Brightens up the day
Walking through the park now
Feels like I'm okay

[Verse 2]
Birds are singing sweetly
Trees are dancing too
Flowers bloom to greet me
Sky is crystal blue

[Chorus]
Sunlight shine on me
Show me where to be
Fill my heart with light
Make everything alright

[Verse 3]
Kids are laughing playing
Echoes fill the air
People pass and smile now
Spreading love to share

[Verse 4]
Every step feels lighter
With the sun in view
No clouds in the sky now
Just a perfect hue

[Chorus]
Sunlight shine on me
Show me where to be
Fill my heart with light
Make everything alright
title: Sunlight Shine
